verses.name: Jeremiah 20:16
verses.text: And let that man be as the cities which the Lord overthrew, and repented not: and let him hear the cry in the morning, and the shouting at noontide;

verses.name: Jeremiah 20:17
verses.text: Because he slew me not from the womb; or that my mother might have been my grave, and her womb to be always great with me.

verses.name: Jeremiah 20:18
verses.text: Wherefore came I forth out of the womb to see labour and sorrow, that my days should be consumed with shame?
